channel.title: Shopkeepers Will Not Talk!
channel.description:
Several Questions:
I'm having trouble getting certain NPC's to talk in game. I don't know how to get them working. Sorry for the nooby question but I'm new to this LOL. Thanks!
How do I get the master fisher to talk and give out fish?
I have portals added, but they won't teleport. How do I make em teleport?
